Valleyforge is Thomas Bechholds (synths, organ, piano, vocoder) from Aachen, Germany with Michael Seitz (drums, percussion, synths) and JÃƒÂ¼rgen Winter (guitars). 

"I don&#039;t give out praise easily. However, this is a time when I am more than impressed; I&#039;m astonished. This album is truly authentic to the best of what was being recorded in the mid to late 1970s New Age synthesizer scene. This recording is almost haunting. It&#039;s as if the talented musicians who recorded this album were transported through time and just started jamming. I was alive and listening in the mid to late 1970s. I&#039;ve built my life around the sound of 1975 to 1985 New Age synthmusic. So, I feel that I am an authority on this subject. And I can safely say that this is a phenomenal disc. If you like Floyd, Parsons, Carlos, Tomita, Vangelis, Baumann, Tangerine Dream, or any of the other New Age notables of that era-- then give this a listen!"
